maqras.text: 84|1|Ten ga sake warete,
84|2|sono shu (no inochi) o kiki, shitagau toki,
84|3|daichi ga nobe hiroge rare,
84|4|sono Chu no mono o hakidashite sora ni nari,
84|5|sono shu (no o meirei) o kiki, shitagau toki.
84|6|O ningen yo, hontoni anata wa,-nushi no omoto e to roku shite doryoku suru mono. Kare ni au koto ni naru nodearu.
84|7|Sonotoki migite ni sono shosatsu o watasa reru mono ni tsuite wa,
84|8|kare no keisan wa sugu yoi ni seisan sa re,
84|9|kare-ra wa yorokonde, jibun no hitobito no moto ni kaerudearou.
84|10|Daga haigo ni shosatsu o watasa reru mono ni tsuite wa,
84|11|jikani shi o motomete sakebu nodaga,
84|12|moeru hono de yaka reyou.
84|13|Hontoni kare wa, jibun no hitobito no naka de kanraku shite ita.
84|14|Kare wa, hontoni (omo no moto ni) kaeru koto nado naidearou to omotte ita.
84|15|Iya,-nushi wa itsumo kare o mitoshite ora reru.
84|16|Watashi wa, rakujitsu no yubae ni yotte chikau.
84|17|Yoru to, soreni kaeri tsudou mono ni oite,
84|18|mata michitaru tsuki ni kakete (chikau).
84|19|Anata gata wa, kanarazu isso kara hoka-so ni noborudearou.
84|20|Soredemo, kare-ra ga shinjinai no wa do shita wake ka.
84|21|Kuruan ga, kare-ra ni Satoru 唱 Sa reru to, kare-ra wa sajida shiyou to wa shinai. 〔Sajida〕
84|22|iya, shinjinai mono wa,(sore o) usodearu to iu.
84|23|Daga arra wa, kare-ra no mune ni kakusu koto o jukuchi nasa reru.
84|24|Sorede anata wa, tsuretsuna chobatsu o kare-ra ni tsutae nasai.
84|25|Daga shinko shite zenko ni isoshimu mono wa betsudearu. Kare-ra ni wa taeru koto no nai hosho ga arou.
85|1|Sho seiza no aru ten ni oite,
85|2|yakusoku sa reta (shinpan no)-bi ni oite,
85|3|rissho suru mono to, rissho sa reru mono to ni oite (chikau).
85|4|Ana no junin wa horobosa re,
85|5|hi ni wa maki ga tsugi tasa reru.
85|6|Miyo. Kare-ra wa sono hata ni suwari,
85|7|shinja ni taishite kare-ra ga okonatta koto (no subete) ni tsuite, rissho sa reru.
85|8|Kare-ra ga kare-ra (shinja) o hakugai shita no wa, iryoku aru okata, sanbi sa rerubeki okata arra o, kare-ra (shinja) ga shinko shita tame nihokanaranai.
85|9|Kare ni, ten to ji no taiken wa zokusuru. Arra wa subete no koto no rissho-sha de ara reru.
85|10|Hontoni shinko suru otome o hakugai shite, sorekara kaigo shinakatta mono ni wa jigoku no chobatsu ga ari, mata kare-ra ni wa homurabi no chobatsu ga arou.
85|11|Shinko shite zenko ni isoshinda mono ni wa, kawa ga shita o nagareru rakuen ga arou. Kore wa idaina kofuku no jojudearu.
85|12|Hontoni anata no omo no torae-kata (chobatsu) wa kyoretsudearu.
85|13|Kare koso wa sozo o nasa re, mata sore o kurikaesa reru okatadearu.
85|14|Kare wa, kan'yo ni shite hakuai narabinai okata.
85|15|Eiko ni michita, shiko no gyokuza no omo.
85|16|Kare wa o nozomi no koto o, suiko nasa reru.
85|17|Gunzei no monogatari ga, anata ni tasshita ka,
85|18|firuaun to samudo (no min no).
85|19|Iya, shinjinai mono wa (nao shinri o) usodearu to shite iru.
85|20|Daga arra wa, haigo kara kare-ra o tori kakoma reru.
85|21|Iya kore wa, eiko ni michita kuruan de,
85|22|shugo sa reta ishibumi-ban ni (meiki sa rete iru).
86|1|Ten to, yoruotozurerumono ni yotte (chikau).
86|2|Yoru otozureru mono ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
86|3|(Soreha) kirameki kagayaku hoshi.
86|4|Dare mo jibun no ue ni gadian (tenshi) o motanai mono wanai.
86|5|Ningen wa, nani kara tsukura reta ka o kosatsu sa se nasai.
86|6|Kare wa funshutsu suru mizu kara tsukura re,
86|7|(soreha) rokkotsu to koshi no ma kara detekuru.
86|8|Hontoni kare wa, kare o (aratana seimei ni) hikimodosu koto ga kanodearu.
86|9|Kakusa reta koto ga bakuro sa reru hi,
86|10|(ningen ni wa) chikara mo naku, dare no tasuke mo nai.
86|11|(Kaiten shite) kaeru ten ni yotte,
86|12|sake wareru daichi ni yotte (chikau).
86|13|Hontoni kore wa,(zen'aku o) shikibetsu suru okotoba,
86|14|soreha tawamure-gotode wanai.
86|15|Hontoni kare-ra wa, inbo o takurande iru.
86|16|Ware mo mata sakubo o megurasu.
86|17|Dakara fushin-sha-tachi o yuyo shi, shibaraku honin suruga i.
